title: Marian V Esanu Takes Over the Mic Today
itunes:title: Marian V Esanu Takes Over the Mic Today
description:
We, as people, have a chronic fear of public speaking, and yet, we are addicted to podcasting. Everyone has a message they want to be heard, so how do you raise your voice above the noise - especially if you’re starting with nothing?
 
Marian V Esanu is the perfect example of the hustle and hunger that make up the American dream. From anonymous immigrant to 7-figure entrepreneur, he embodies what it means to build success one brick at a time. These days, Marian coaches others on attracting and acquiring high-end clients in their business through his program and the High End Client Acquisition podcast. 
 
On this episode of the Underdog Empowerment podcast, Marian hijacks the mic to talk with Zach about how to grow a podcast from nothing, how to get A-list guests for interviews, and how to rank your show high without ruining your relationships. Want to know how a podcast stands out from the crowd? Listen in.
 
 
Show Notes: https://underdogempowerment.com/marian-v-esanu/
 
Get More Involved: 
  1. Leave A Review & Subscribe On iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/underdog-empowerment/id1373572178
  2. Access Our Top Resource Recommendations: https://underdogempowerment.com/resources/
  3. Join The Elite Underdog Alphas With The Free Underdog Report: https://underdogempowerment.com/report
  4. Subscribe On YouTube: https://underdogempowerment.com/youtube
